content.body: Hey all, Aki still manages the DNS record for TC39.es and wants to hand it over because it is getting lots of hits and costing her money.
content.formatted_body: Hey all, Aki still manages the DNS record for TC39.es and wants to hand it over because it is getting lots of hits and costing her money.

content.body: Is there a way we can transfer ownership and or reduce costs?
jasew: Maybe you could invite Aki here?
content.formatted_body: jasew: Maybe you could invite Aki here?

content.body:

more than the yearly domain registration cost?
content.formatted_body:
getting lots of hits and costing her money

content.body: I made a spreadsheet of the DNS records I have. I could have sworn I owned the domain but I guess not?
I got enough requests in the last 36 hours that I expect the bill will be about $100
